auth.title: Authentication
auth.description: Fill in username and password if the proxy server requires authentication

bypass.title: Proxy Bypass List
bypass.description: These domains will bypass the proxy and connect directly. Wildcards supported (e.g., *.local)

test.title: Connection Test
test.description: Test if the proxy connection is working properly

platformSupport.title: Platform Support
platformSupport.web: Limited support via CORS proxy server (browser restrictions)
